}} '''Xuân Phú''' is a [[communes of Vietnam|commune]] (''xã'') and village in [[Yên Dũng District]], [[Bac Giang Province]], in northeastern [[Vietnam]].<ref>[http://gis.chinhphu.vn/ Ministry of Public Information in Vietnam]</ref> ==References== {{reflist}} {{Bac Giang Province}} {{coord|13|17|N|109|15|E|display=title|region:VN_type:city_source:GNS-enwiki}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xuan Phu}}
